tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    game_id INT NOT NULL,
    score INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);
CREATE TABLE players ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, player_score INT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE games ( game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, game_genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, game_release_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE scores ( score_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT, game_id INT, score_value INT NOT NULL, score_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id), FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id) );

CREATE TABLE rankings ( ranking_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT, game_id INT, ranking_position INT NOT NULL, ranking_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id), FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id) );

CREATE TABLE player_scores (
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    score INTEGER,
    PRIMARY KEY(player_id, game_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rankings (
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    rank INTEGER,
    PRIMARY KEY(player_id, game_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    achievement_name STRING,
    FOREIGN KEY(player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);
